extendedInfo.description: Best Luxury Hotel of the month. 10 hotels nominated, one hotel wins.Best Luxury Hotel is a digital platform dedicated to the world's best luxury hotels. One winning hotel is picked by luxury consumers every month to win the coveted Best Luxury Hotel title.See the selection of stunning hotels from all over the world. From resort hotels offering private beachfront villas to luxurious city establishments with the latest technology and spa facilities. View the hotels that have been awarded the Best Luxury Hotel title in the past and discover their amazing features and secrets.You can vote for this month's #BestLuxuryHotel directly from the app by selecting from our latest nominees. Your vote will be automatically counted and be used to help determine the winner of Best Luxury Hotel for the month.
